title: bcd-watch: New baselines (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD New Baselines Report, Tue Jul 02 2024

Summary of Baseline changes
from Tue Jun 25 2024 16:30:19 GMT-0400 (Eastern Daylight Time)
to Tue Jul 02 2024 06:05:40 GMT-0400 (Eastern Daylight Time)

svg
